My Story

Two years ago, my life changed at UIUC.

I learned to program.

Since then, I've cofounded two educational startups at my school: Classwhole and CoursesIllinois.

I've been employed at 004 USA, Apple, and now the University of Illinois as an Android developer.

If you'd like to see what I'm capable of, click through to my many projects below.

My name is Kiran and I love inventing.

    Notable projects

  • Classwhole (current) RubyOnRails
  • Illinois App (current) Android
  • RabbitQR Android RubyOnRails
  • SmileBot Android
  • CoursesIllinois RubyOnRails
  • CoursesIllinois Mobile WebOS
  • MultiS7GraphView iOS

I specialize in Android, Front-end, and Rails development.
